description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato Oven Baked Chips With Avocado Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chips & fries,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Budget,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato Oven Baked Chips With Avocado Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place sweet potato, olive oil, polenta, paprika, garlic powder, salt and pepper in a mixing bowl and stir to combine.
Spread out in a single layer on a baking tray and bake for 40 minutes or until cooked through and golden.
Meanwhile, place remaining ingredients in a bowl and mash with a fork to combine. Transfer to a small dip bowl and serve with baked sweet potato chips.
